Trustee_19_pre_2.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_2.content: Throughout the investment process, I have demonstrated trustworthiness and pro-sociality by proposing a fair allocation plan that benefits both myself and the investor. I successfully managed the investment and ensured accurate profit distribution, reflecting my competence and adherence to norms. My previous reputation aligns with this positive behavior, as I have consistently acted in the best interest of my investors.

Trustee_19_pre_6.name: Mateo Garcia
Trustee_19_pre_6.content: During this investment process, I demonstrated high levels of trustworthiness and pro-sociality by ensuring a fair profit allocation plan that greatly favored the investor, providing them 70% of the profits. My commitment to transparent communication and ethical behavior has reinforced my reputation as a reliable trustee. Coupled with my previous record of successfully managing investments and distributing profits accurately, my updated reputation reflects my dedication to the interests of my investors and adherence to social norms.
